Html:
"This converter is particularly designed to take simple HTML - the kind of HTML typically produced by WYSIWYG editors (such as TinyMCE)"
does that mean I can take the text ,pictures and tables which were generated by TinyMCE (end user) and save it in word (docx) file?
if you can explain how I will be very very grateful
thank you very much
I've written some more detailed setup details which may be useful to you.
